oai_dc:dc.dc:title: New fungicides for apple scab control in organic growing
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bengtsson, Marianne
Wulff, Ednar
Pedersen, Hanne Lindhard
Paaske, Klaus
Jørgensen, Hans J. Lyngs
Hockenhull, John
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Fruit and berries
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In the future control of apple scab in organic apple growing could be based on the use of natural fungicides like plant extracts and oils. Current projects are testing this idea.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Danish Research Centre for Organic Farming
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Bengtsson, Marianne; Wulff, Ednar; Pedersen, Hanne Lindhard; Paaske, Klaus; Jørgensen, Hans J. Lyngs and Hockenhull, John (2004) New fungicides for apple scab control in organic growing. Newsletter from Danish Research Centre for Organic Farming (3).
